PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-10612008-06-12,  ,  ,  ,  LAB, 
ActDonkin Coal Block Development Opportunity Act
PrecisREGULATIONS RESPECTING EMPLOYMENT RELATED TO MINES AT THE DONKIN COAL BLOCK which would establish a regulatory regime for any employment in or in connection with the operation of a mine at the Donkin coal block and to allow Nova Scotia to be the single regulator and administrator of the labour regime at the Donkin coal block by excluding the Canada Labour Code from application and incorporating provincial industrial relations, occupational health and safety, and labour standards laws by reference.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0208 Publication Date: 2008-06-25
